Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Eflornithine hydrochloride is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Neuroblastoma that is high risk. It is used in adults and children who had a partial or complete response to combination therapy that included anti-GD2 immunotherapy.

Section.Para: Eflornithine hydrochloride is also being studied in the treatment of other conditions and types of cancer.
